page.title: 15Stagsden,Church Life.
page.content: Althogh playing less of a central role in village life than in the past (the choir and Mother's Union have gone) there are still regular Sunday services,a team of bell ringers has formed and a women's organisation meets monthly. Recent discussion at a church meeting considered future life at St. Leonard's.It was suggested that Family Service be made more informal, brighter in style, with opportunity for children and young people to participate.The Sunday School could be linked with the Family Service.
